ARABIC: وَإِن تُكَذِّبُوا۟ فَقَدْ كَذَّبَ أُمَمٌ مِّن قَبْلِكُمْ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And if you deny it, nations before you also denied the truth. The Messenger is only responsible for clear transmission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But if you deny, then many a people have denied before you. The duty of the apostle is to convey the message clearly."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And if you give the lie (to the Messenger), then many nations before you also gave the lie (to their Messengers). The Messenger is charged with no other duty than to deliver the Message in clear terms.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: If you, (pagans), call our (revelations) lies, certainly many generations living before you have also done the same thing. The duty of a Messenger is only to preach clearly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And if you deny, then many nations have denied before you; and the Noble Messenger is not responsible except to plainly convey (the message).”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And if you deny, then nations before you have denied. And the duty of the Messenger is only to convey plainly."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And if you reject (the truth), nations before you did indeed reject (the truth); and nothing is incumbent on the apostle but a plain delivering (of the message).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But if you cry me lies, nations cried lies before you; and it is only for the Messenger to deliver the Manifest Message.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But if ye deny, then nations have denied before you. The messenger is only to convey (the message) plainly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: If you reject the truth, other communities before you also rejected the truth. The messenger's responsibility is only to convey the message clearly."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And if ye belie me, then communities before you have belied: and upon the apostle is naught but a preaching manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: If you impugn [the Apostle’s teaching], then [other] nations have impugned [likewise] before you, and the Apostle’s duty is only to communicate in clear terms.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And if ye reject (the Message), so did generations before you: and the duty of the messenger is only to preach publicly (and clearly)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And if you deny, then nations before you have denied (their Messengers). And the duty of the Messenger is only to convey (the Message) plainly."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If you belie me, other nations before you also belied. It is only for a Messenger to deliver the clear deliverance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: If you disbelieve, communities before you have also disbelieved. The Messenger is only responsible for clear transmission.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And if you [people] deny [the message] - already nations before you have denied. And there is not upon the Messenger except [the duty of] clear notification.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [29:18] But if you deny, that is, if you deny me, O people of Mecca, then [many] communities have denied before you, that is, before my time; and the messenger’s duty is only to communicate [the Message] clearly’. Both stories are meant to comfort the Prophet (s). And regarding his people, God, exalted be He, says:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But if ye deny) the message brought by Muhammad (pbuh) (then nations have denied before you) the messages brought by their messengers and We destroyed them as a consequence. (The messenger is only to convey (the Message) plainly) on behalf of Allah in a language they understand.
